dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - MS Ref
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 2004 11:50 AM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity - MS Ref. 34792]

Forwarding to Legal for review.

-- 
Thanks,
Garrett White
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing 
Activity - MS Ref. 34792
Date: Tue, 14 Sep 2004 11:45:13 +0100
From: MSAntiPiracy02 <Internet2@microsoft-antipiracy.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

VIA EMAIL:

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity

URL: http://www.adipexstore.net/, http://www.adipexstore.net/?s=apps,
http://www.adipexstore.net/?s=games, http://www.adipexstore.net/?s=faq,
http://www.adipexstore.net/?s=contact

CASE #: 34792

14 September 2004

Dear Sir or Madam,

Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which
appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed copies
of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted
computer programs published by Microsoft.

1. Identification of copyrighted works:

Computer program(s):
BizTalk Server 2004 Developer Edition
BizTalk Server 2004 Enterprise Edition
Business Portal 2.0
Small Business Manager
Digital Image Suite 10
Encarta Reference Library 2005
Great Plains 8
Host Integration Server 2004
ISA Server 2004
Map Point 2002
Office Project Professional 2003 Multilingual User Interface
Office Publisher 2003
Office Small Business Edition 2003
Picture It! Photo Premium 2002
Office Project Server 2003
Speech Server 2004 Enterprise Edition
Streets & Trips 2005
Virtual PC 2004
Office Visio Professional 2003
Visual Studio .NET Professional
Windows 2003 Server Multilingual User Interface
Windows XP Media Center Edition 2004
Works 2002
AutoRoute 2004
Commerce Server 2002 Standard Edition
Encarta Reference Library CD 2004
Exchange 2003 Enterprise
Office FrontPage 2003
Money 2004 Standard
MSDN - Library
Office 11
Office 2000 Premium
Office 2000 Professional
Office 2003 Multilingual User Interface Pack
Office XP Developer
Office XP Professional
Outlook 2002
Picture It! Digital Image Pro version 7
Picture It! Photo Premium 2002
Plus! XP
Project 2000
Project 2002 Professional
Office Project Professional 2003
Office Publisher 2003
Share Point Portal Server 2001
Small Business Manager
SQL Server 2000 Developer Edition
SQL Server 7.0 Enterprise Edition
Systems Management Server 2003
Visio 2002 Enterprise
Visio 2002 Standard
Visual Studio .NET Enterprise Architect
Visual Basic 6
Visual FoxPro Professional 7
Visual FoxPro Professional 8
Visual SourceSafe 6.0c
Windows 2000 Professional
Windows 2000 Server
Windows Longhorn 4051
Windows NT Server
Windows 2003 Server Enterprise
Windows 2003 Server Standard
Windows 2003 Server Web
Windows XP Professional
Windows XP Home Edition
Works 2002
Dungeon Siege: Legends of Aranna
FreeLancer
Rise of Nations: Thrones and Patriots

Copyright owner(s):
Microsoft Corporation

2. Infringing material or activity found at the following location(s):
http://www.adipexstore.net/, http://www.adipexstore.net/?s=apps,
http://www.adipexstore.net/?s=games, http://www.adipexstore.net/?s=faq,
http://www.adipexstore.net/?s=contact

The above location is offering to distribute unauthorized copies of
copyrighted computer programs.

3. Statement of authority:

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this
notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Microsoft,
the owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good
faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been
authorized by Microsoft, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take
expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described
above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of this
software via your company's network.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding
what actions you take.

Yours sincerely,

James Young
Internet Investigator

for Microsoft Corporation
One Microsoft Way
Redmond, WA 98052
United States of America

E-mail: Internet1@microsoft-antipiracy.com
